TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23HUB-NEXTGEN-TEST-PLANODSselect Regexp_Substr(pp , '[^\^]+', 1, 1) at1, Regexp_Substr(pp , '[^\^]+', 1, 2) att2, Regexp_Substr(pp , '[^\^]+', 1, 3) att3 from ( select replace(parent_node,'/','^') pp from hubs_udf_file_list hufl where 1= 1 and node_type = 'F' )
